thread.title: Communications Director - Portland - Sports and Fitness
thread.title_full: Communications Director - Portland - Sports and Fitness

title: Communications Director - Portland - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-15-2015 Brief Job Description: Create and maintain an impeccable association website and maintain all social media accounts by overseeing content, identifying, and implementing necessary changes within brand guidelines. Ensure the success of association public relations by creating a public relations plan and carrying it out effectively.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
